entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
